Comprehensive skill for diagnosing and optimizing insurance CRM systems built

- Database schema troubleshooting and SQL migrations
- Calendar integration debugging (Google Calendar, Calendly)
- Analytics reporting fixes for revenue/client tracking
- Excel import workflows for HealthSherpa data
- OAuth token refresh and environment configuration
- Performance optimization for large client databases
- Common insurance CRM issues and solutions

Based on real-world CRM debugging session covering calendar API failures,
missing database columns, analytics showing zero data, and OAuth configuration.
